game

Class player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.player

  • public class player
extends java.lang.Object
    player class which controls player movement and behavior within game
    Author:
    Max & Lucas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      player()
      player constructor which sets all default values along with default image, sets coordinates for where to spawn.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLife()
      adds a life to the player
      int getHeight()
      accessor method to return image height
      java.awt.Image getImage()
      accessor method to return current image
      int getLives()
      accessor method to return the player lives
      int getScore()
      accessor method to return player score
      int getWidth()
      accessor method to return image width
      int getX()
      accessor method to return X
      int getY()
      accessor method to return Y
      boolean gotHit()
      accessor method to return if player is currently colliding with Goomba
      boolean isDead()
      accessor method to determine if player is dead
      void move(java.lang.String action)
      move method which updates Mario's position based on game events and keyboard inputs.
      void pressedKey(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      handles incoming pressed key Events, if right keys it sets the players to move coordinates accordingly, starts animation for running if a or d pressed.
      void releasedKey(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      handles incoming released key Events, stops player movement as key released should stop equal stopping of player movement.
      void setHit(boolean toSet)
      method to set the player hit status
      boolean toDie()
      accessor method to return if player is to die, helpful for starting the death animation

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(java.lang.String action)
        move method which updates Mario's position based on game events and keyboard inputs. Handles jumping, moving left & right, and player death.
        Parameters:
        action, - the movement action to handle

      • pressedKey

        public void pressedKey(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        handles incoming pressed key Events, if right keys it sets the players to move coordinates accordingly, starts animation for running if a or d pressed.
        Parameters:
        e - incoming pressed key

      • releasedKey

        public void releasedKey(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        handles incoming released key Events, stops player movement as key released should stop equal stopping of player movement. Also sets image back to default
        Parameters:
        e - incoming pressed key
